effect.diamond_pearl: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s. This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
effect.platinum: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s. This move cannot be copied by mirror move.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s. This move cannot be copied by mirror move.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s.
short_effect.platinum: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Discards the user’s stat changes and copies the target’s.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
flavor_text.platinum: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the foe.
